text: [Music]
Lancaster University is well known for
being in the top 10 of all the major
league tables in the UK is a relatively
new university and in many ways it
punches well above its its weight for
its age and size at Lancaster we've
invested innovation to ensure that we
can provide a unique new services that
will help our students in understanding
the university life has been how to
engage in their academic studies and to
get the most from their experience the
our Lancaster voice project came about
because we were looking at innovative
new technologies that would form part of
the future for students and staff and
voice came up as one of those we decided
to look at delivering in the Amazon a
lexer from there we've built a
partnership up with Amazon and had
support and success in using that
platform
functionality we started with was around
their academic studies so things like
when's my next lecture when's my next
seminar we focused around aspects of the
campus life so when's the bar open can i
book a sports court and also we chose to
focus on areas that might help students
with a disability so things about how
they can access how they can receive
help and support that they need we're
using loads of the Amazon Web Services
that's one of the great things is that
there's a service for almost everything
you need and so using lex for
conversation we using elasticsearch
we're using some of the cloud watch
technology to see what the skills are
doing if you can engage with the student
in their own language and use that to
drive your digital delivery then that's
an amazing experience so kind of a game
changer and that's why voice is so
important to us and that's why we
invested in the voice project I have to
say that quite genuinely the whole
experience has been really impressive in
terms of the level of engagement of AWS
their support for Lancaster helping us
innovate I can genuinely say that's been
second to no
[Music]
